title: 12/16/20 HOUR 3- Trevor Lawrence
itunes:title: 12/16/20 HOUR 3- Trevor Lawrence
description:
Trevor Lawrence tells Dan that his second choice to Clemson was Georgia which would still keep him in a warm state. Trevor says that he would rather win a national championship over a Heisman; but he would take them both if they came hand in hand.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
